archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0189
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
As a Privacy, Fraud and Compliance Representative I want fraudulent transactions to be identified immediately So that any theft/loss to the organisation can be avoided
Fraud Management Scenarios that must be addressed
1) Repeated purchases from the same IP address 2) Restrictions based on the total value of the cart - flag orders so that appropriate actions can be taken 3) If customer email address is associated with known Fraud, order will be declined 4) If customer Contact Number is associated with known Fraud, order will be declined 5) If customer name is associated with known Fraud, order will be declined 6) If customer’s Service Address matched with known fraud physical address, order will be declined 7) If IP address is overseas and order contains any hardware, order will be declined 8) Name on the order and the credit card must match 9) Same Delivery Address for multiple orders - flag orders so that appropriate actions can be taken

properties.value: BSS | Fraud Detection | Identify Fraudulent Orders Immediately
